column4: I have a question: Is it possible to install an Ubuntu to a pendrive? I have a 8gb pendrive and I have tried the ubuntu installer from pendrive and it worked well. But I would like to install to it.
i do that all the time. Be sure to tell the installer to install teh bootloader to the pendrive also.
ive even installed a full install to a pendrive from a 'live' install on a 2nd pendrive
or install to a usb-hard drive also works.
